body.p:
Louisville Ky
June 30" 1864
Assistant Sec State
Sir
I have the honor to request of you the appointment of "Notary Public" for Jefferson County.

Very Respectfully & c
Charles M McClain
Box 86
I recommend Mr Charles M McClain as being worthy and competent

C. H. Barkley
C. H. BARKLEY
NOTARY PUBLIC
JEFF. COUNTY KY
